subject: Hockey, Ice
lead_paragraph: Rick DiPietro, the Islanders’ No. 1 goaltender, shook off Boynton’s goal just 24 seconds into the game and was effective in his first start of the season.
snippet: Rick DiPietro, the Islanders’ No. 1 goaltender, shook off Boynton’s goal just 24 seconds into the game and was effective in his first start of the season.
